p: In Morocco, Gharby et al. [ 29] reported 58.5% of oleic acid after extraction of esterified hexane extract, while Khodami et al. [ 27] showed that hexane extract of NS was mainly unsaturated fatty acids such as palmitic, linoleic, and oleic acids. Piras et al. [ 30] reported that Turkish NS contained 55% unsaturated fatty acids. Unidentified components in the esterified hexane extract represented only 13%. Those might be dependent on the esterification/methylation process. Ekowati et al. [ 31] and De Oliveira and Khater [ 10] reported many other compounds not found in our work.
